Last Stand.name: Last Stand
Last Stand.flavor: As death looms before you, you push yourself to battle on.
Last Stand.trigger: You drop to 0 hit points or fewer and don’t die
Last Stand.effect: You are dying but don’t fall unconscious because of that condition. At the end of your next turn, you fall unconscious if you are still dying.
Last Stand.sustainMinor: You take 5 damage and don’t fall unconscious.

Tiger's Leap.name: Tiger's Leap
Tiger's Leap.flavor: With a surge of strength and will, you leap a great distance without a running start.
Tiger's Leap.prerequisite: You must be trained in Athletics.
Tiger's Leap.effect: You make an Athletics check to jump with a +5 power bonus. You are considered to have a running start and can move as far as the check allows.

Devastating Strike.name: Devastating Strike
Devastating Strike.flavor: You strike with awesome power, more concerned with offensive strength than defensive posturing.
Devastating Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a melee weapon in two hands.
Devastating Strike.onHit:
1[W] + 1d8 + Strength modifier damage.
Level 11: 1[W] + 2d8 + Strength modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + 3d8 + Strength modifier damage.
Devastating Strike.effect: Until the start of your next turn, any attacker gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against you. If you are raging, attackers do not gain this bonus.

Great Cleave.name: Great Cleave
Great Cleave.flavor: The numbers arrayed against you mean nothing. You swing your weapon in a great arc, stopped by nothing so trivial as flesh and bone.
Great Cleave.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Great Cleave.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage + 1 damage for each enemy adjacent to you.

Shrug It Off.name: Shrug It Off
Shrug It Off.flavor: With a brutal shake of your head, you slough off a hindrance before it can affect you.
Shrug It Off.trigger: You are subjected to an effect that a save can end
Shrug It Off.effect: You make a saving throw against the triggering effect. If you succeed, you shift 1 square as a free action.

Storm of Blades.name: Storm of Blades
Storm of Blades.flavor: You lift your weapon again and again, each blow’s impact fueling the next swing.
Storm of Blades.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Repeat the attack until you miss or until you make three attacks. As soon as an attack misses, this power ends.

Rage Strike.name: Rage Strike
Rage Strike.flavor: You channel your primal rage into a devastating attack.
Rage Strike.requirement: You must be raging and have at least one unused rage power.
Rage Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC. To make this attack, you expend an unused barbarian rage power.
Rage Strike.onHit:
You deal damage based on the level of the rage power you expend:
1st level 3[W] + Strength modifier
5th level 4[W] + Strength modifier
9th level 5[W] + Strength modifier
15th level 6[W] + Strength modifier
19th level 7[W] + Strength modifier
20th level 7[W] + Strength modifier
25th level 8[W] + Strength modifier
29th level 9[W] + Strength modifier
Rage Strike.special: You can use this power twice per day.

Swift Charge.name: Swift Charge
Swift Charge.flavor: As your foe falls, you rush toward your next victim.
Swift Charge.trigger: Your attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points

Brutal Slam.name: Brutal Slam
Brutal Slam.flavor: Your forceful blow pushes your foe into one of its companions.
Brutal Slam.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone. Then one enemy adjacent to the target takes 1d8 + your Strength modifier damage.

Blood Sacrifice.name: Blood Sacrifice
Blood Sacrifice.flavor: You wound yourself, offering your pain to the spirits in exchange for a more telling strike.
Blood Sacrifice.effect: Before the attack, you can take 1d10 damage. If you do so, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to the damage you take + your Constitution modifier.

Rolling Boulder.name: Rolling Boulder
Rolling Boulder.flavor: You barrel through your enemies, knocking them aside as you bear down on your chosen foe.
Rolling Boulder.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Rolling Boulder.effect: You knock the primary target prone. You then shift 3 squares and can move through prone enemies’ spaces during the shift. Make a secondary attack.
Rolling Boulder.whirlingSlayer: The number of squares you shift equals 1 + your Dexterity modifier.
Rolling Boulder.secondaryTarget: One enemy other than the primary target

Ancient Clan Strike.name: Ancient Clan Strike
Ancient Clan Strike.flavor: Your tattoos, scars, and markings burn with primal energy, guiding and empowering a deadly blow.
Ancient Clan Strike.effect: Before the attack, you can take 3d6 damage. If you do so, you gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll and do not expend this power if you miss.
Ancient Clan Strike.ragebloodVigor: If you take the damage, you also gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.

Lines of Rage.name: Lines of Rage
Lines of Rage.flavor: Straining your muscles to the point of agony, you channel the pain into a devastating blow.
Lines of Rage.effect: Before the attack, you can take 2d8 damage. If you do so, the attack deals 2d8 extra damage.
Lines of Rage.ragebloodVigor: You can take 1d8 damage instead of 2d8.

Cutting the Path.name: Cutting the Path
Cutting the Path.flavor: You knock away nearby enemies, then dash across the battlefield to attack a single foe.
Cutting the Path.onHit: You push the primary target 2 squares and knock it prone.
Cutting the Path.effect: You move your speed. Then make a secondary attack.
Cutting the Path.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary targets

Rabid Beast.name: Rabid Beast
Rabid Beast.flavor: You recklessly stalk a distant enemy and are emboldened by attacks on the way.
Rabid Beast.effect: You grant combat advantage until the start of your next turn. You then move your speed and make the following attack. If an enemy makes an opportunity attack against you as a result of this movement, your attack deals 1[W] extra damage.

Savage Ancestors Strike.name: Savage Ancestors Strike
Savage Ancestors Strike.flavor: You feel the pain of your own fury, causing your strike to be even more life-threatening to your foe.
Savage Ancestors Strike.effect: Before the attack, you can take 5d6 damage to gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll. If you do so, you do not expend this power if you miss.
Savage Ancestors Strike.ragebloodVigor: You can take 3d6 damage instead of 5d6.
Savage Ancestors Strike.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Howling Strike.name: Howling Strike
Howling Strike.flavor: With a blood-freezing scream, you throw yourself into the fray.
Howling Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a melee weapon in two hands.
Howling Strike.onHit:
1[W] + 1d6 + Strength modifier damage.
Level 11: 1[W] + 2d6 + Strength modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + 3d6 + Strength modifier damage.
Howling Strike.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack. If you are raging, you can move 2 extra squares as part of the charge.

Pressing Strike.name: Pressing Strike
Pressing Strike.flavor: You push lesser foes from your path, moving through the lines of battle at will.
Pressing Strike.effect: Before the attack, you shift 2 squares. You can move through an enemy’s space during the shift, but you can’t end there.
Pressing Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. If you are raging, the attack deals 1d6 extra damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Recuperating Strike.name: Recuperating Strike
Recuperating Strike.flavor: Nothing restores your will to fight more than slamming your weapon into a foe. Each crushing swing gives you more will to press on.
Recuperating Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a melee weapon in two hands.
Recuperating Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. If you are raging, the number of temporary hit points you gain equals 5 + your Constitution modifier.
Level 11: 1[W] + 1d6 + Strength modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + 2d6 + Strength modifier damage.

Avalanche Strike.name: Avalanche Strike
Avalanche Strike.flavor: You drop your guard and put all your strength into a devastating overhead swing.
Avalanche Strike.ragebloodVigor: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Avalanche Strike.effect: Until the start of your next turn, any attacker gains a +4 bonus to attack rolls against you.

Bloodhunt Rage.name: Bloodhunt Rage
Bloodhunt Rage.flavor: Your rage surges up from the depths of your pain to bring pain to the wounded.
Bloodhunt Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the bloodhunt. Until the rage ends, you gain a bonus to melee damage rolls equal to your Constitution modifier if either you or your target is bloodied.

Swift Panther Rage.name: Swift Panther Rage
Swift Panther Rage.flavor: You slash your foe with fury as the spirit of the swift panther grants you its speed and agility.
Swift Panther Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the swift panther. Until the rage ends, you gain a +2 bonus to speed and can shift 2 squares as a move action.

Primal Vitality.name: Primal Vitality
Primal Vitality.flavor: Drawing strength from the ground beneath your feet, you push away the pain of minor wounds.
Primal Vitality.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level + your Constitution modifier. If you are raging, the number of temporary hit points you gain equals one-half your level + twice your Constitution modifier.

Blade Sweep.name: Blade Sweep
Blade Sweep.flavor: Though the fury of your attack is directed at a single foe, no nearby enemy is spared your wrath.
Blade Sweep.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each bloodied enemy adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Blade Sweep.ragebloodVigor: Each enemy adjacent to you that is not bloodied also takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Hammer Fall.name: Hammer Fall
Hammer Fall.flavor: You swing your weapon in a great underhand arc, and the impact lifts your target off its feet and sends it crashing to the ground.
Hammer Fall.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Frost Wolf Rage.name: Frost Wolf Rage
Frost Wolf Rage.flavor: Like the great spirit wolf whose breath is the cold north wind, you are wreathed in frost, chilling those who try to harm you.
Frost Wolf Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the frost wolf. Until the rage ends, any enemy that hits you with a melee attack takes cold damage equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier.

Thunder Hawk Rage.name: Thunder Hawk Rage
Thunder Hawk Rage.flavor: Your thunderous attack dazes your foe as you channel the great spirit hawk whose wings rumble across the sky. Your screaming charge blasts your enemies with thunder.
Thunder Hawk Rage.onHit: You knock the secondary target prone.
Thunder Hawk Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the thunder hawk. Until the rage ends, you can use the Thunder Hawk Rage Attack power once per turn only on your own turn.
Thunder Hawk Rage.requirement: The Thunder Hawk Rage power must be active to use this power.

Instinctive Charge.name: Instinctive Charge
Instinctive Charge.flavor: Instinctively aware of danger, you are poised to fight as soon as the battle begins.
Instinctive Charge.trigger: You roll initiative at the beginning of an encounter
Instinctive Charge.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to your initiative. You also gain a +2 power bonus to your first attack roll during the encounter.

Great Shout.name: Great Shout
Great Shout.flavor: You slam your weapon into a foe, then give voice to the fury of your ancestors, cowing those who dare to stand against you.
Great Shout.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each enemy within 5 squares of you takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Tide of Blood.name: Tide of Blood
Tide of Blood.flavor: Your anger sweeps over every nearby enemy, drawing blood to fuel the tide of your assault on one of them.
Tide of Blood.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The attack deals 1 extra damage for each enemy adjacent to you.
Tide of Blood.ragebloodVigor: The attack instead deals 1 extra damage for each enemy within a number of squares of you equal to your Constitution modifier.

Oak Hammer Rage.name: Oak Hammer Rage
Oak Hammer Rage.flavor: The ancient spirit of the oak knocks your foe to the ground. As you rage, you knock foe after foe down to the earth, then strike them with the earth’s fury.
Oak Hammer Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Oak Hammer Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the oak hammer. Until the rage ends, whenever you hit a target with a melee attack, you knock that target prone. If that target is already prone, the attack instead deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Stone Bear Rage.name: Stone Bear Rage
Stone Bear Rage.flavor: The spirit of the stone bear that hunts at the mountains’ roots courses through you, and its fury blunts the pain of your wounds.
Stone Bear Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the stone bear. Until the rage ends, you gain resistance to all damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Mountain Roots.name: Mountain Roots
Mountain Roots.flavor: You sink your spirit into the earth to stand your ground.
Mountain Roots.trigger: You are pulled, pushed, or slid
Mountain Roots.effect: You negate the forced movement. Until the stance ends, you can negate forced movement against you.

Wellspring of Renewal.name: Wellspring of Renewal
Wellspring of Renewal.flavor: You draw on a fount of primal energy to renew your strength and your focus.
Wellspring of Renewal.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level + your Constitution modifier. In addition, if you are marked, that condition ends.

Blade Whirlwind.name: Blade Whirlwind
Blade Whirlwind.flavor: Driven by strength and will, your weapon sweeps in a mighty arc that cuts every foe around you and drives them back from your fury.
Blade Whirlwind.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Blade Whirlwind.ragebloodVigor: You also push the target 1 square.

Crack the Skull.name: Crack the Skull
Crack the Skull.flavor: You slam your weapon against the skull of your foe, leaving it disoriented.
Crack the Skull.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Flameheart Rage.name: Flameheart Rage
Flameheart Rage.flavor: The spirit of the red dragon imbues your attack with fiery wrath, scorching your foe. As you rage, the fire of the dragon’s heart lashes out at those that strike you.
Flameheart Rage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Flameheart Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the red dragon. Until the rage ends, any creature that hits you with a melee attack takes fire damage equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.

Thunderfury Rage.name: Thunderfury Rage
Thunderfury Rage.flavor: Charging at your foe and knocking it to the ground, you call on the spirit of the thunderfury boar to drive you into a frenzy. In your rage, you lash out at foes that attack you.
Thunderfury Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Thunderfury Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the thunderfury boar. Until the rage ends, when any enemy adjacent to you hits or misses you, you can make a melee basic attack against that enemy as an immediate reaction.

Great Stomp.name: Great Stomp
Great Stomp.flavor: As you slam your foot into the ground, primal energy pours through you, buckling the ground beneath you with its power.
Great Stomp.effect: Each square in the burst becomes difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

Spur the Cycle.name: Spur the Cycle
Spur the Cycle.flavor: Just as in the natural world, death leads to new life: killing your foe spurs you to further action.
Spur the Cycle.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points during your turn

Shoulder Slam.name: Shoulder Slam
Shoulder Slam.flavor: You lower your shoulder into your foes, driving them across the ground.
Shoulder Slam.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. You then shift 1 square and make a secondary attack.
Shoulder Slam.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Shoulder Slam.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack. If you charge, you gain a bonus to the primary attack roll equal to your Constitution modifier.

Vigorous Strike.name: Vigorous Strike
Vigorous Strike.flavor: You strike your foe with a mighty assault that bolsters you against attacks.
Vigorous Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level.
Vigorous Strike.ragebloodVigor: The number of temporary hit points you gain equals one-half your level + your Constitution modifier.

Storm Drake Rage.name: Storm Drake Rage
Storm Drake Rage.flavor: Lightning cascades around you and flows into your enemy. As you rage, lightning lashes out at any foe that strikes you, knocking it to the ground.
Storm Drake Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage, and ongoing 10 lightning damage (save ends).
Storm Drake Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the storm drake. Until the rage ends, any enemy that hits you with a melee attack takes 5 lightning damage and is knocked prone.

Winter Phoenix Rage.name: Winter Phoenix Rage
Winter Phoenix Rage.flavor: Your blow erupts in grasping frost as the spirit of the winter phoenix enters you. As you rage, vitality surges through you to ward you from death.
Winter Phoenix Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and ongoing 10 cold damage (save ends).
Winter Phoenix Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the winter phoenix. Until the rage ends, you gain regeneration 5 + your Constitution modifier. In addition, the first time you drop to 0 hit points or fewer, you can spend a healing surge as an immediate interrupt.

Primal Instinct.name: Primal Instinct
Primal Instinct.flavor: You close your eyes and strike, guided more by your instincts than by your senses.
Primal Instinct.effect: You gain blindsight 10 until the end of the encounter.

Untouched.name: Untouched
Untouched.flavor: Primal energy from the earth and the air courses through you, cleansing you of the dire effects of battle.
Untouched.effect: You make a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end. You gain a bonus to each saving throw equal to your Constitution modifier.

Crater Fall.name: Crater Fall
Crater Fall.flavor: You swing your weapon in a great underhand arc and then drive it up into your opponent, sending the foe flying back through the air.
Crater Fall.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares and knock it prone. This forced movement ignores hindering terrain, such as a pit, between the target’s starting square and its destination. If you push the target through squares occupied by other enemies, those enemies are knocked prone.
Crater Fall.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack. If you charge, the number of squares you push the target equals your Strength modifier.

Fatal Strike.name: Fatal Strike
Fatal Strike.flavor: Your powerful attack, like the coming of winter, puts an end to growth and healing.
Fatal Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target cannot regain hit points until the start of your next turn.
Fatal Strike.ragebloodVigor: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Blood Hunger Rage.name: Blood Hunger Rage
Blood Hunger Rage.flavor: Your fierce attack leaves your target reeling. As you rage, the Primal Beast surges in your blood, drawing on the carnage around you to empower your attacks.
Blood Hunger Rage.onHit: 7[W] + Strength modifier, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Blood Hunger Rage.effect: You enter the blood hunger rage. Until the rage ends, you gain a bonus to attack rolls equal to the number of bloodied creatures within 3 squares of you.

Stone Tempest Rage.name: Stone Tempest Rage
Stone Tempest Rage.flavor: Like the mighty storms that shake the earth, your attack crashes into your foe and brings it to the ground. As you rage, your fury turns your attacks into devastating wounds.
Stone Tempest Rage.onHit: 7[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and you knock the target prone.
Stone Tempest Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the stone tempest. Until the rage ends, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20.

Hurricane of Blades.name: Hurricane of Blades
Hurricane of Blades.flavor: You become a tempest of steel, ripping through your foes in a horrific display of carnage.
Hurricane of Blades.effect: Make the attack three more times against the same target or different ones.

Rage of the Primal Beast.name: Rage of the Primal Beast
Rage of the Primal Beast.flavor: The Primal Beast awakens within you, and your attack leaves your foe bleeding. As you rage, you feed on the presence of your foes; overwhelming numbers only make you stronger.
Rage of the Primal Beast.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Rage of the Primal Beast.effect: You enter the rage of the Primal Beast. Until the rage ends, you gain a bonus to attack rolls equal to the number of enemies you can see.

Winter Ghost Rage.name: Winter Ghost Rage
Winter Ghost Rage.flavor: The touch of your weapon is the wintry chill of death. As you rage, the spirit of winter fills you, causing you to become a ghost to your foes as you near death.
Winter Ghost Rage.onHit: 6[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and ongoing 10 cold damage (save ends).
Winter Ghost Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the winter ghost. Until the rage ends, you are insubstantial while you are bloodied.

Blood Bear Rage.name: Blood Bear Rage
Blood Bear Rage.flavor: You strike, then call on the spirit of the blood bear, drawing on its great strength and crushing grip to destroy your foes.
Blood Bear Rage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target.
Blood Bear Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the blood bear. Until the rage ends, you gain a +4 bonus to grab attacks. If an enemy starts its turn grabbed by you, it takes 5 + your Strength modifier damage.

Flying Serpent Rage.name: Flying Serpent Rage
Flying Serpent Rage.flavor: Coiling, spitting, and darting, you react to the enemy’s charge with brutal swiftness.
Flying Serpent Rage.trigger: An enemy charges you or an ally
Flying Serpent Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the flying serpent. Until the rage ends, you can shift 2 squares as a move action. In addition, after making a charge attack on your turn, you can take further actions during that turn.

Tidal Rage.name: Tidal Rage
Tidal Rage.flavor: You swing your weapon in an arc, and waves of fury issue forth. You then overpower your foes, moving them around the battlefield.
Tidal Rage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 4 squares.
Tidal Rage.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
Tidal Rage.effect: You enter the tidal rage. Until the rage ends, once per round, when you hit an adjacent enemy with a primal power, you slide each enemy adjacent to you 1 square.

Desert Wind Rage.name: Desert Wind Rage
Desert Wind Rage.flavor: A desert wind rises in the wake of your strike, blinding your foe. The sirocco then expands and settles in, scouring even distant enemies.
Desert Wind Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Desert Wind Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the desert wind. Until the rage ends, at the start of each of your turns, you deal 5 + your Strength modifier fire damage to each enemy within 5 squares of you.

Rock Tree Rage.name: Rock Tree Rage
Rock Tree Rage.flavor: Your overwhelming strike calls the spirit of the great rock tree, rooting you and allowing you to lash out at approaching enemies.
Rock Tree Rage.trigger: An enemy enters a square adjacent to you
Rock Tree Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the rock tree. Until the rage ends, when any enemy enters a square adjacent to you, you can make an opportunity attack against that enemy. In addition, if you are pulled, pushed, or slid, you can reduce the distance of the forced movement by 2 squares.

Elder Tuskbrother Rage.name: Elder Tuskbrother Rage
Elder Tuskbrother Rage.flavor: Hurtling at an enemy, you make an inescapable attack. The spirit of the tuskbrother boar inspires you, adding to the force of your charges.
Elder Tuskbrother Rage.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Elder Tuskbrother Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the elder tuskbrother. Until the rage ends, whenever you charge an enemy and hit, you push that enemy a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Elder Tuskbrother Rage.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Clawed Ancestor Rage.name: Clawed Ancestor Rage
Clawed Ancestor Rage.flavor: You strike a mighty blow, then draw the enemy close. The shadowy presence of the Great Bear grows within you, roaring into full frenzy as you clench a foe.
Clawed Ancestor Rage.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target.
Clawed Ancestor Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the clawed ancestor. Until the rage ends, you can make a grab attempt as a minor action once per round. You add your weapon’s enhancement bonus to this grab attempt. In addition, if an enemy begins its turn grabbed by you, it takes 10 + your Strength modifier damage.

Thunderstorm Rage.name: Thunderstorm Rage
Thunderstorm Rage.flavor: You hit your foe with a shocking strike, sparking a rage that causes thunder to boom over your enemies.
Thunderstorm Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 15 lightning damage (save ends).
Thunderstorm Rage.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends).
Thunderstorm Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the thunderstorm. Until the rage ends, once per round when you make an attack roll against an enemy and hit, you can make the attack roll a second time against that enemy. If the second attack roll hits, the attack deals 2[W] extra thunder damage.

Bounding Stride.name: Bounding Stride
Bounding Stride.flavor: You lope across the battlefield, your wounds fueling your stride.
Bounding Stride.effect: You move your speed + 2, or your speed + 6 if you are bloodied.

Snarling Defiance.name: Snarling Defiance
Snarling Defiance.flavor: Your blood flows, and your response is a feral snarl as you prepare to make the offender pay.
Snarling Defiance.trigger: You are hit and damaged by an attack
Snarling Defiance.effect: You take half damage from the attack and gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the attacker until the end of your next turn.

Primal Charge.name: Primal Charge
Primal Charge.flavor: You thunder across the battlefield in a blur of steel and speed.
Primal Charge.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +4 power bonus to speed when charging.

Totemic Scarification.name: Totemic Scarification
Totemic Scarification.flavor: As you set aside caution for relentlessness, glowing totemic symbols begin carving themselves across your skin.
Totemic Scarification.effect: Until the stance ends, you take a –2 penalty to all defenses but gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls.

Raging Resurgence.name: Raging Resurgence
Raging Resurgence.flavor: The spirits rejoice in your enemy’s errant blow, and their exultation invigorates you.
Raging Resurgence.trigger: An enemy misses you with an attack
Raging Resurgence.effect: You spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Resurgent Strike.name: Resurgent Strike
Resurgent Strike.flavor: You slash, you are rejuvenated, and your enemy’s blood wells.
Resurgent Strike.onHit: You either gain 3 + your Constitution modifier temporary hit points or end one dazing or weakening effect on yourself. The target then takes 2[W] + your Strength modifier damage.

Run Rampant.name: Run Rampant
Run Rampant.flavor: With bestial might, you break free and step forward, eager for battle again.
Run Rampant.effect: You make either an escape attempt or a saving throw against an effect that immobilizes, restrains, or slows you. You gain a bonus to the roll equal to your Strength modifier.

Climber's Claws.name: Climber's Claws
Climber's Claws.flavor: Thick claws spring from your hands, allowing you to scale surfaces quickly.
Climber's Claws.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a climb speed equal to your speed.

Barbaric Instinct.name: Barbaric Instinct
Barbaric Instinct.flavor: Submerging conscious thought, you cut through the fog that threatens to envelop your mind.
Barbaric Instinct.trigger: You are subjected to a dazing or a stunning effect
Barbaric Instinct.effect: If the effect would have dazed you, you aren’t dazed. If the effect would have stunned you, you are dazed instead.

Scent of Blood.name: Scent of Blood
Scent of Blood.flavor: As your lifeblood drains from you, the scent of it awakens primal power, strengthening your blows and aiding your recuperation.
Scent of Blood.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a bonus equal to your Constitution modifier to damage rolls and your healing surge value.

Feral Rejuvenation.name: Feral Rejuvenation
Feral Rejuvenation.flavor: You call on the spirits to stitch your wounds, proudly displaying the blood you have spilled in their names.
Feral Rejuvenation.effect: You spend a healing surge. If the triggering attack reduced an enemy to 0 hit points, you regain additional hit points equal to one-half your level + your Charisma modifier.

Howl of the Alpha Wolf.name: Howl of the Alpha Wolf
Howl of the Alpha Wolf.flavor: You snarl nearly incomprehensible orders to your allies, and they hasten to obey.
Howl of the Alpha Wolf.target: One ally in the burst, or each ally in the burst if you have reduced an enemy to 0 hit points during this turn
Howl of the Alpha Wolf.effect: You slide each target 2 squares. You then shift 3 squares.

Serpent Fang Rage.name: Serpent Fang Rage
Serpent Fang Rage.flavor: Scale-shaped tattoos form on your arms, and you strike with a suddenly envenomed weapon. From then on, your rage-flushed markings distract those you damage.
Serpent Fang Rage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier poison damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).
Serpent Fang Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the serpent fang. Until the rage ends, any enemy you hit grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Savage Juggernaut Rage.name: Savage Juggernaut Rage
Savage Juggernaut Rage.flavor: Your blow triggers an inner wrath that grows more and more unstoppable with each enemy you fell.
Savage Juggernaut Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the savage juggernaut. Until the rage ends, you gain a power bonus to attack rolls equal to the number of nonminion creatures you have reduced to 0 hit points since you entered the rage.

Voracious Predator Rage.name: Voracious Predator Rage
Voracious Predator Rage.flavor: You swing mightily, and spirit predators arise, empowering your blows whenever you leave an enemy’s body in your wake.
Voracious Predator Rage.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is already bloodied, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage.
Voracious Predator Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the voracious predator. Until the rage ends, when you reduce any enemy to 0 hit points with an attack, you gain a +2 power bonus to your next weapon attack roll, and that next attack deals 1[W] extra damage if it hits.

Circle of Blood Rage.name: Circle of Blood Rage
Circle of Blood Rage.flavor: You spin, hacking at your enemies. The image of the circle of blood used in your initiation rites grips your mind, empowering your later attacks.
Circle of Blood Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the circle of blood. Until the rage ends, you gain a power bonus to attack rolls with barbarian at-will attack powers and rage strike equal to the number of creatures you targeted with this power.

Raptor's Eye Rage.name: Raptor's Eye Rage
Raptor's Eye Rage.flavor: With the vision of a bird of prey, you strike with deadly accuracy.
Raptor's Eye Rage.attack: Strength vs. AC. You make two attack rolls and use either result.
Raptor's Eye Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the raptor’s eye. Until the rage ends, you can reroll a single damage die each time you roll damage.

Roar of Triumph.name: Roar of Triumph
Roar of Triumph.flavor: Your howl of victory shakes your enemies to the core, as they know your blood thirst is not yet quenched.
Roar of Triumph.trigger: Your attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points
Roar of Triumph.effect: Each target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Bloodletting.name: Bloodletting
Bloodletting.flavor: Your powerful attack is meant to finish off a wounded foe.
Bloodletting.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is bloodied, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Vault the Fallen.name: Vault the Fallen
Vault the Fallen.flavor: You leap from one foe to the next, leaving blood in your wake.
Vault the Fallen.effect: If you target two creatures, you can shift 1 square after the first attack.
Vault the Fallen.thanebornTriumph: The number of squares you can shift equals your Charisma modifier.

Macetail's Rage.name: Macetail's Rage
Macetail's Rage.flavor: You knock your enemy to the ground with a slam like the behemoth’s heavy tail, and the rage of the macetail fills you, refreshing you with every blow of your weapon.
Macetail's Rage.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Macetail's Rage.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Macetail's Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the macetail behemoth. Until the rage ends, whenever you hit, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Strength modifier.

Rage Drake's Frenzy.name: Rage Drake's Frenzy
Rage Drake's Frenzy.flavor: You slam your weapon into your wounded foe, and the rage drake’s spirit fills you. You erupt in violence, swinging furiously at a new foe as soon as the last one falls.
Rage Drake's Frenzy.attack: Strength vs. AC. If the target is bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
Rage Drake's Frenzy.effect: You enter the rage of the rage drake. Until the rage ends, once per round when you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points, you can make a melee basic attack as a free action.

Combat Sprint.name: Combat Sprint
Combat Sprint.flavor: Having saved a bit of strength for just this moment, you burst across the battlefield.
Combat Sprint.effect: You move your speed + 4. You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against any opportunity attack you provoke with this movement.

Stonebreaker.name: Stonebreaker
Stonebreaker.flavor: Without hesitation, you smash through the door.
Stonebreaker.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +5 bonus to Strength checks to break objects, and you deal double damage against objects.

Blood Strike.name: Blood Strike
Blood Strike.flavor: Blood calls to blood. Your pain and your enemy’s give strength to your assault.
Blood Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you or the target is bloodied, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage.

Daring Charge.name: Daring Charge
Daring Charge.flavor: You leap forward and charge your foes. Those who try to strike you as you charge ahead only embolden your attack.
Daring Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack. If you charge, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll for each opportunity attack made against you while you charge.
Daring Charge.thanebornTriumph: You gain a bonus to AC equal to your Charisma modifier against any opportunity attack you provoke during your charge.

Shatterbone Strike.name: Shatterbone Strike
Shatterbone Strike.flavor: The fury of your assault knocks your foe off balance, leaving a hole in its defenses.
Shatterbone Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.
Shatterbone Strike.thanebornTriumph: The penalty to AC equals your Charisma modifier.

Silver Phoenix Rage.name: Silver Phoenix Rage
Silver Phoenix Rage.flavor: Your mighty blow erupts in silver fire as the spirit of the phoenix enters you. As you rage, vitality surges through you to ward you from death.
Silver Phoenix Rage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Silver Phoenix Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the silver phoenix. Until the rage ends, you gain regeneration 3. In addition, the first time you drop to 0 hit points or fewer, you can spend a healing surge as an immediate interrupt.

Vengeful Storm Rage.name: Vengeful Storm Rage
Vengeful Storm Rage.flavor: Your whirlwind assault engulfs your enemies in lightning as you channel the storm’s fury.
Vengeful Storm Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the vengeful storm. Until the rage ends, at the start of each of your turns, each enemy adjacent to you takes 3 lightning damage.

Combat Surge.name: Combat Surge
Combat Surge.flavor: As your attack goes awry, you react from the heat of your rage, without pause or thought, reversing your weapon and striking again.

Loss of Will.name: Loss of Will
Loss of Will.flavor: As you turn aside your foe’s attack, you stare into its eyes. Your enemy now knows that the battle is in your favor.
Loss of Will.trigger: An enemy misses you with you an attack
Loss of Will.effect: Until the end of the target’s next turn, the target takes a penalty to attack rolls against you equal to your Charisma modifier.

Curtain of Steel.name: Curtain of Steel
Curtain of Steel.flavor: You are the pacing lion, the circling predator. No attack will come toward you without being answered in kind.
Curtain of Steel.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you hits or misses you
Curtain of Steel.thanebornTriumph: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Feast of Violence.name: Feast of Violence
Feast of Violence.flavor: You drop your guard as you come close for your attack, drawing primal strength from the violence directed at you.
Feast of Violence.special: You can choose to provoke opportunity attacks when you make this attack. If you do so, you gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each creature that attacks you, and the attack deals 1[W] extra damage.

Black Dragon Rage.name: Black Dragon Rage
Black Dragon Rage.flavor: Channeling the spirit of the black dragon’s caustic heart, your attack erupts in searing acid. As you rage, acid sears the eyes of nearby foes.
Black Dragon Rage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier acid damage, and ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends).
Black Dragon Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the black dragon. Until the rage ends, at the start of each of your turns, each enemy adjacent to you is blinded until the end of your turn.

White Tiger Rage.name: White Tiger Rage
White Tiger Rage.flavor: The spirit of the white tiger empowers your attack, freezing your enemy in place. As the tiger’s rage fills you, winter’s chill slows your foes.
White Tiger Rage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
White Tiger Rage.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
White Tiger Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the white tiger. Until the rage ends, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you is slowed until the end of its turn.

Deny Death.name: Deny Death
Deny Death.flavor: The darkness will not swallow you until you have finished what you set out to do.
Deny Death.trigger: You drop to 0 hit points or fewer and don’t die
Deny Death.effect: You are dying but don’t fall unconscious because of that condition. At the end of your next turn, you fall unconscious if you are still dying.

Heart Strike.name: Heart Strike
Heart Strike.flavor: You put the weight of your spirit behind every swing of your weapon.
Heart Strike.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit with an at-will attack power, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Terror's Cry.name: Terror's Cry
Terror's Cry.flavor: As you smite your foe, you utter a terrible howl that strikes terror into your enemies’ hearts.
Terror's Cry.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 1.
Terror's Cry.secondaryOnHit: The secondary target moves 2 squares away from you as a free action and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Terror's Cry.thanebornTriumph: The penalty to attack rolls equals your Charisma modifier.

Thunderfall.name: Thunderfall
Thunderfall.flavor: You lower your shoulder, dipping your weapon beneath your opponent’s guard and driving it up into the foe’s body to knock it off balance.
Thunderfall.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square and knock it prone.
Thunderfall.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack. If you charge and hit, the number of squares you push the target equals your Constitution modifier.

Hunting Lion Rage.name: Hunting Lion Rage
Hunting Lion Rage.flavor: You channel the spirit of the hunting lion into a mighty blow. As you rage, the lion’s spirit makes the most of every advantage.
Hunting Lion Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the hunting lion. Until the rage ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against any target that is granting combat advantage to you.

Iron Hammer Rage.name: Iron Hammer Rage
Iron Hammer Rage.flavor: Even the iron that sleeps in the earth has its primal spirits, which fuel your mighty attacks to dash your foes against walls and large trees.
Iron Hammer Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.
Iron Hammer Rage.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Iron Hammer Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the iron hammer. Until the rage ends, whenever you hit a creature with a melee attack, you push that creature 2 squares. If the creature is adjacent to blocking terrain at the end of the push, the creature takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Fuel the Fire.name: Fuel the Fire
Fuel the Fire.flavor: You lower your weapon, allowing your opponent to score a glancing blow, but the pain only fuels your rage and adds strength to your own attacks.
Fuel the Fire.effect: Each enemy adjacent to you can make an opportunity attack against you. Until the end of your next turn, you gain a bonus to attack rolls equal to +2 for each enemy that makes the opportunity attack.

Primal Resistance.name: Primal Resistance
Primal Resistance.flavor: You stand untouched by the magical energy of your foes.
Primal Resistance.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain resist 10 against a damage type of your choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

Devastating Blow.name: Devastating Blow
Devastating Blow.flavor: Your powerful blow shatters your target’s defenses.
Devastating Blow.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.
Devastating Blow.thanebornTriumph: The penalty to AC equals your Charisma modifier.

Mountain Grasp.name: Mountain Grasp
Mountain Grasp.flavor: You bring your weapon down in a great overhead arc, rooting your foe in place with the weight of your blow.
Mountain Grasp.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized and grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Threatening Fury.name: Threatening Fury
Threatening Fury.flavor: Your fierce attack brings you into your opponent’s reach, ensuring that it can’t attack you or escape without reprisal.
Threatening Fury.effect: Whenever the target shifts or makes an attack roll against you before the end of your next turn, you can make an opportunity attack against it.

Ghost Viper Rage.name: Ghost Viper Rage
Ghost Viper Rage.flavor: The spirit of the ghost viper infuses you, sending venom coursing through the veins of your foe. As you rage, the viper’s spirit throws nearby foes off guard.
Ghost Viper Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends).
Ghost Viper Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the ghost viper. Until the rage ends, any enemy that starts its turn next to you grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of its next turn.

Hydra Rage.name: Hydra Rage
Hydra Rage.flavor: Your overwhelming attack leaves your target staggered, and the spirit of the hydra courses through you. As you rage, your weapon darts and bites like the hydra’s many heads.
Hydra Rage.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Hydra Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the hydra. Until the rage ends, once per round when you make an attack that misses, you can make a melee basic attack as a free action.

Primal Vigor.name: Primal Vigor
Primal Vigor.flavor: Infused with primal energy, you draw on the power of your opponent’s attack to spur your will to live.
Primal Vigor.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Primal Vigor.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain resistance to all damage equal to one-half your level + your Constitution modifier.

Berserker's Shout.name: Berserker's Shout
Berserker's Shout.flavor: You shout your fury as you strike your foe, sending fear like daggers into the hearts of nearby enemies.
Berserker's Shout.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each enemy adjacent to you takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Berserker's Shout.thanebornTriumph: The penalty to attack rolls equals your Charisma modifier.

Staggering Strike.name: Staggering Strike
Staggering Strike.flavor: With a quick, instinctive strike, you knock your opponent senseless.
Staggering Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Ash Hammer Rage.name: Ash Hammer Rage
Ash Hammer Rage.flavor: You pull the unyielding might of the forest into your weapon and drive your foe back. As you rage, you draw vitality through your rooted connection to the ground.
Ash Hammer Rage.onHit:
7[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the
target a number of squares equal to your Constitution
modifier.
Ash Hammer Rage.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Ash Hammer Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the ash hammer. Until the rage ends, whenever you hit with an attack, you gain temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Charisma modifier. If that attack already grants temporary hit points to you, add your Charisma modifier to the number of temporary hit points you gain.

Blue Dragon Rage.name: Blue Dragon Rage
Blue Dragon Rage.flavor: Your weapon surges with lightning like the blue dragon’s horn. As you rage, the spirit of the blue dragon courses through you, and your blows erupt in bursts of lightning.
Blue Dragon Rage.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 lightning damage (save ends).
Blue Dragon Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the blue dragon. Until the rage ends, once per round when you hit a target with a melee attack, each enemy adjacent to that target takes 10 lightning damage.

Bonebreaker.name: Bonebreaker
Bonebreaker.flavor: You twist and lean into your weapon just as your opponent tries to pull away, rending flesh and bone.
Bonebreaker.trigger: An enemy leaves a square adjacent to you
Bonebreaker.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes 10 damage if it moves more than 1 square during the movement that this attack interrupts.

Butcher's Feast.name: Butcher's Feast
Butcher's Feast.flavor: No attack will come toward you without being answered in kind.
Butcher's Feast.onHit: 6[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you can make a melee basic attack as a free action against any enemy adjacent to you that hits or misses you.
Butcher's Feast.thanebornTriumph: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a power bonus to basic attack rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

Rampaging Dragon Strike.name: Rampaging Dragon Strike
Rampaging Dragon Strike.flavor: Like a terrible dragon, you dominate the battlefield, knocking aside the lesser foes to pit your strength against the strongest.
Rampaging Dragon Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the primary target 1 square.
Rampaging Dragon Strike.effect: You move your speed and then make a secondary attack.
Rampaging Dragon Strike.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target

Crimson Phoenix Rage.name: Crimson Phoenix Rage
Crimson Phoenix Rage.flavor: Your mighty blow erupts in flame to engulf your nearby foes as the spirit of the crimson phoenix enters you. As you rage, fire bursts from your weapon with every strike, and vitality surges through you to ward you from death.
Crimson Phoenix Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Crimson Phoenix Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the crimson phoenix. Until the rage ends, your at-will attack powers deal 1[W] extra fire damage on a hit. In addition, whenever you drop to 0 hit points or fewer, you can spend a healing surge as an immediate interrupt.

World Serpent Rage.name: World Serpent Rage
World Serpent Rage.flavor: You smash your weapon into your foe with all your strength as the spirit of the World Serpent courses through you. As you rage, your spirit’s coils keep your enemies close and empower your attacks against them.
World Serpent Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the World Serpent. Until the rage ends, you can make a melee basic attack as a free action against any enemy adjacent to you that shifts. In addition, on your turn, you gain a +5 bonus to damage rolls against any enemy that was adjacent to you at the start of your turn.
World Serpent Rage.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Whirling Rend.name: Whirling Rend
Whirling Rend.flavor: You strike out in two directions, drawing blood from different enemies.
Whirling Rend.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Whirling Rend.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an enemy adjacent to you other than the target takes 1[W] damage (off-hand weapon). If you are raging, add your Dexterity modifier to both damage rolls.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and 2[W] damage (off-hand weapon).

Whirling Frenzy.name: Whirling Frenzy
Whirling Frenzy.flavor: Someone will bleed after every strike of this frenzy. You prefer to see your enemy’s blood but are prepared to see your own.
Whirling Frenzy.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Whirling Frenzy.whirlingSlayer: The attack can target Reflex instead of AC.
Whirling Frenzy.onMiss: You take 1d6 damage, with no modifiers.

Whirling Step.name: Whirling Step
Whirling Step.flavor: You strike out and keep moving. As you pass, many enemies bleed.
Whirling Step.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Whirling Step.effect: You shift 2 squares. If the attack hit, you deal 1[W] damage (off-hand weapon) to one or two enemies that are adjacent to you at some point during the shift.
Whirling Step.whirlingSlayer: The number of squares you shift equals your Dexterity modifier.

Rippling Blades.name: Rippling Blades
Rippling Blades.flavor: If your foe avoids your attack, you accept a glancing blow to maneuver that foe into a weak position, ready for your friend’s attack.
Rippling Blades.onMiss: You can take 5 damage to enable an ally adjacent to the target to make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.
Rippling Blades.thanebornTriumph: The ally gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Slash and Slash Again.name: Slash and Slash Again
Slash and Slash Again.flavor: You strike hard and then lay into enemies all around you.
Slash and Slash Again.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Slash and Slash Again.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, you can use a free action to deal 1[W] damage (off-hand weapon) to any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you.
Slash and Slash Again.whirlingSlayer: Add your Dexterity modifier to the offhand weapon damage.

Whirling Skirmish.name: Whirling Skirmish
Whirling Skirmish.flavor: Using the momentum of your strike, you cut across the battlefield, eluding blows and then imperiling your foes.
Whirling Skirmish.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Whirling Skirmish.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. You shift 3 squares and then deal 2[W] damage (off-hand weapon) to each enemy adjacent to you.
Whirling Skirmish.whirlingSlayer: The number of squares you shift equals 1 + your Dexterity modifier.

Berserker's Flurry.name: Berserker's Flurry
Berserker's Flurry.flavor: You strike deeply, then extend your weapons in a whirl of rage, striking foes that venture too close.
Berserker's Flurry.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Berserker's Flurry.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you deal 1[W] damage (off-hand weapon) to any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you.
Berserker's Flurry.whirlingSlayer: Add your Dexterity modifier to the offhand weapon damage.

This One is Mine!.name: This One is Mine!
This One is Mine!.flavor: Taking advantage of an enemy focused on one of your allies, you deliver a mighty strike, which turns that enemy’s focus to you.
This One is Mine!.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against any enemy marked by any of your allies. Then make the following attack.
This One is Mine!.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark the enemy until the end of your next turn.
This One is Mine!.ragebloodVigor: Until the mark ends, you gain a bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to your Constitution modifier.

Frenzied Scramble.name: Frenzied Scramble
Frenzied Scramble.flavor: You slam your enemy with your weapon and then whirl toward other foes to give them a taste of the pain.
Frenzied Scramble.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Frenzied Scramble.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. You shift 3 squares and then deal 2[W] damage (off-hand weapon) to each enemy adjacent to you.
Frenzied Scramble.whirlingSlayer: Add your Dexterity modifier to the off-hand weapon damage.

Thunder Hooves Rage.name: Thunder Hooves Rage
Thunder Hooves Rage.flavor: You hammer the enemy with a heavy blow, and the spirits of stampeding beasts fill you with strength.
Thunder Hooves Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the thunder hooves. Until the rage ends, you can move through one or two enemies’ spaces during each of your turns. When you move through an enemy’s space, your next attack against that enemy during the same turn deals 1[W] extra damage.

Savage Growl.name: Savage Growl
Savage Growl.flavor: If the blow you just delivered wasn’t enough to get your foe’s attention, your menacing growl cannot be ignored.
Savage Growl.trigger: You hit an enemy and don’t reduce it to 0 hit points
Savage Growl.effect: You mark the target until the end of your next turn. Until the mark ends, you and the target deal 1d8 extra damage against each other.

Whirling Lunge.name: Whirling Lunge
Whirling Lunge.flavor: Striking down one foe, you whirl deeper into enemy ranks.
Whirling Lunge.trigger: Your attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points
Whirling Lunge.effect: You shift 2 squares and then deal 1[W] damage (off-hand weapon) to an enemy adjacent to you that you can see.

Indomitable Shift.name: Indomitable Shift
Indomitable Shift.flavor: You pound across the battlefield, leaving no opening as you move and drawing strength from the numbers arrayed against you.
Indomitable Shift.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier. You gain 1d10 temporary hit points plus 1 additional temporary hit point for each enemy within 2 squares of you.

Feral Scythe.name: Feral Scythe
Feral Scythe.flavor: Your weapon is a swirling vortex of destruction, biting deep into every foe beside you.

Blood Wrath.name: Blood Wrath
Blood Wrath.flavor: The blood of your foes fills you with a thirst for more violence.
Blood Wrath.attack: Strength vs. AC. You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if the target is bloodied.
Blood Wrath.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Blood Wrath.ragebloodVigor: The bonus to attack rolls equals your Constitution modifier.

Arcing Throw.name: Arcing Throw
Arcing Throw.flavor: Spirits of wind and storm carry your weapon across the battlefield to smite your target, then linger around that foe to hinder its movement.
Arcing Throw.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Arcing Throw.special: When you use this power, you can make the attack with a melee weapon as if it were a heavy thrown weapon. If it is a magic weapon, it returns to your hand after the attack is resolved.

Frenzied Beast Rage.name: Frenzied Beast Rage
Frenzied Beast Rage.flavor: You are so consumed with primal fury that you enter a self-destructive rampage.
Frenzied Beast Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the frenzied beast. Until the rage ends, once per round as a minor action you can take 5 damage to deal 5 + your Constitution modifier damage to an enemy adjacent to you. The damage you take cannot be reduced or negated.

Clawfoot Berserker Rage.name: Clawfoot Berserker Rage
Clawfoot Berserker Rage.flavor: You channel the behemoth’s fury to avenge injury to allies who fight alongside you.
Clawfoot Berserker Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the clawfoot berserker. Until the rage ends, when any ally within 5 squares of you becomes bloodied, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn and can make a melee basic attack as an immediate reaction.

Foe to Foe.name: Foe to Foe
Foe to Foe.flavor: Each foe that you slay fills you with the rush of battle, and as the battle rages, you cut your way from one foe to the next.
Foe to Foe.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you have reduced at least one non-minion enemy to 0 hit points during this encounter, this attack deals 1d8 extra damage. While raging, you instead deal 1d10 extra damage.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

Laugh it Off.name: Laugh it Off
Laugh it Off.flavor: You laugh at your foe’s attack, making even its mightiest effort seem pointless against your boundless endurance.
Laugh it Off.trigger: You are hit by an enemy’s attack.
Laugh it Off.effect: Reduce the triggering attack’s damage by an amount equal to your Constitution modifier. You gain a +2 power bonus to your next attack roll and damage roll against the triggering enemy made before the end of your next turn.

Howl of Fury.name: Howl of Fury
Howl of Fury.flavor: You strike a hearty blow, then unleash an ear-splitting battle cry.
Howl of Fury.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each enemy in the blast, other than the target, takes thunder damage equal to your Constitution modifier. If you are raging, the thunder damage equals 3 + your Constitution modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and add 5 to the thunder damage, whether or not you are raging.

War Cry.name: War Cry
War Cry.flavor: Your potent victory cry sends nearby enemies reeling in terror.
War Cry.trigger: Your attack reduces an enemy to 0 hit points

Desperate Fury.name: Desperate Fury
Desperate Fury.flavor: Even if it kills you, you’ ll accept nothing less than a solid hit.
Desperate Fury.ragebloodVigor: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Desperate Fury.onMiss: You can take 5 damage to reroll the attack. If the reroll hits, use the hit effect above. If the reroll misses, you take 5 damage.

Escalating Violence.name: Escalating Violence
Escalating Violence.flavor: You hack at your enemy, daring it and its companions to incur your greater fury.
Escalating Violence.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you take damage before the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack rolls and the damage rolls of your next attack.
Escalating Violence.thanebornTriumph: Until the end of your next turn, an ally within 5 squares of you gains a bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to your Charisma modifier.

Shout of Terror.name: Shout of Terror
Shout of Terror.flavor: The primal storm that rages within you manifests as a terrifying battle scream that causes your enemies to hesitate.
Shout of Terror.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each enemy in the blast is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Shout of Terror.thunderbornWrath: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a bonus to damage rolls against slowed creatures equal to your Constitution modifier.

Life Thane Rage.name: Life Thane Rage
Life Thane Rage.flavor: As you strike, raging energy boils out of you as life-giving mist, healing you and invigorating your allies.
Life Thane Rage.effect: You can spend a healing surge. You enter the rage of the life thane. Until the rage ends, any ally who starts his or her turn within 3 squares of you gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Tyrant's Rage.name: Tyrant's Rage
Tyrant's Rage.flavor: Your blow is a prelude to a furious shriek. Your visage reveals a berserker fury, which causes your foes to recoil.
Tyrant's Rage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Tyrant's Rage.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Tyrant's Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the tyrant. Until the rage ends, you can push every enemy adjacent to you 1 square as a minor action once per round.

Savage Comeback.name: Savage Comeback
Savage Comeback.flavor: An enemy tried to hinder you, but you break free, ignoring the injury you suffer in the process.
Savage Comeback.trigger: You are conscious and fail a saving throw
Savage Comeback.effect: You take 2d6 damage and succeed on the saving throw.

Reckless Rampage.name: Reckless Rampage
Reckless Rampage.flavor: As you advance, enemy attacks fuel a wrath that spills over with undeniable force against your chosen target.
Reckless Rampage.effect: Before the attack, you move your speed. If an enemy makes an opportunity attack against you as a result of this movement, you gain combat advantage against the target of this attack.
Reckless Rampage.ragebloodVigor: Add your Constitution modifier to the distance you can move.

Thundering Howl.name: Thundering Howl
Thundering Howl.flavor: You strike and then let out a thunderous battle cry, which knocks your foes back.
Thundering Howl.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each enemy in the blast takes 1d6 thunder damage and is pushed 1 square.
Thundering Howl.thunderbornWrath: The number of squares you push each enemy equals your Constitution modifier.

Ancient Berserkers' Rage.name: Ancient Berserkers' Rage
Ancient Berserkers' Rage.flavor: You lash out and the spirits of ancestral berserkers roar their approval. As always, they are anxious to fight beside a member of the clan.
Ancient Berserkers' Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the ancient berserkers. At the start of each of your turns until the rage ends, you gain combat advantage against each enemy adjacent to you and a power bonus to damage rolls against them equal to your Charisma modifier. These benefits last until the end of your turn.

Rage of the Crimson Hurricane.name: Rage of the Crimson Hurricane
Rage of the Crimson Hurricane.flavor: Your swing arcs around you, and rage transforms you into a swirling storm of death, dangerous to any enemy near you.
Rage of the Crimson Hurricane.effect: Each target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends). You enter the rage of the crimson hurricane. Until the rage ends, the first time you hit an enemy with a primal melee power each turn, each enemy adjacent to you after the attack is resolved takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Razor Wind Rage.name: Razor Wind Rage
Razor Wind Rage.flavor: Your strike batters the crowding enemies, unleashing your rage. From then on, after each devastating blow, primal winds speed you.
Razor Wind Rage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Razor Wind Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the razor wind. Until the rage ends, whenever your Rampage class feature is triggered, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier and then make a melee basic attack against each enemy adjacent to you as a free action, instead of making a single melee basic attack.

Tiger's Claw Rage.name: Tiger's Claw Rage
Tiger's Claw Rage.flavor: Your attack awakens the tiger spirit within you. Its raking claws punish any enemies that avoid your blows.
Tiger's Claw Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the tiger’s claw. Until the rage ends, when you miss any creature with an at-will melee attack, that creature takes 1[W] damage.

Relentless Surge.name: Relentless Surge
Relentless Surge.flavor: With a deep breath, you draw vigor from within yourself.
Relentless Surge.effect: You gain 5 + your Constitution modifier temporary hit points.

Fearsome Smash.name: Fearsome Smash
Fearsome Smash.flavor: Smashing your weapon through your foe’s defenses injures both body and will.
Fearsome Smash.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Fearsome Smash.thanebornTriumph: The penalty to attack rolls equals 1 + your Charisma modifier.
Fearsome Smash.special: You can use this power against an adjacent enemy as an immediate reaction that triggers when that enemy hits you.

Harbinger of Doom.name: Harbinger of Doom
Harbinger of Doom.flavor: You hack through one foe, and your battle cry heralds doom for the enemies before you.
Harbinger of Doom.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each enemy in the blast gains vulnerable 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
Harbinger of Doom.thunderbornWrath: The vulnerability equals 3 + your Constitution modifier.

Looming Threat.name: Looming Threat
Looming Threat.flavor: An ally might have raised a foe’s ire, but once you strike, that enemy must pay attention to you.
Looming Threat.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is marked by an ally, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage. You then mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Looming Threat.ragebloodVigor: Until the mark ends, you gain a power bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to your Constitution modifier.

Rage of the Battle Tyrant.name: Rage of the Battle Tyrant
Rage of the Battle Tyrant.flavor: Your strike awakens a rage within you that urges your allies to move about the battlefield with impunity whenever you hit.
Rage of the Battle Tyrant.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage (save ends).
Rage of the Battle Tyrant.effect: You enter the rage of the battle tyrant. Until the rage ends, when you hit any enemy with a primal attack power, one ally within 2 squares of that enemy can shift 1 square as a free action.

Rage of the Death Spirit.name: Rage of the Death Spirit
Rage of the Death Spirit.flavor: As you strike, robbing your foe of its strength, you awaken a spirit that commands your enemies’ attention.
Rage of the Death Spirit.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).
Rage of the Death Spirit.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Rage of the Death Spirit.effect: You enter the rage of the death spirit. Until the rage ends, as the first action of each of your turns, you can use a free action to mark each enemy within 2 squares of you until the end of your next turn. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against enemies marked by you.

Rage of the Primal Banshee.name: Rage of the Primal Banshee
Rage of the Primal Banshee.flavor: You manifest shrieking spirits as you strike your enemy. While the spirits remain, your foes can’t bring themselves to rush your allies.
Rage of the Primal Banshee.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Rage of the Primal Banshee.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Rage of the Primal Banshee.effect: You enter the rage of the primal banshee. Until the rage ends, enemies cannot charge any ally who is within a number of squares of you equal to your Charisma modifier.

Barbaric Offering.name: Barbaric Offering
Barbaric Offering.flavor: You ruin your foe, and the spirit of triumph steels you against a hindrance.
Barbaric Offering.trigger: You bloody an enemy or reduce it to 0 hit points
Barbaric Offering.effect: You make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end, with a bonus equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum +1).

Enraged Surge.name: Enraged Surge
Enraged Surge.flavor: Your errant blow fuels your anger, empowering your strikes for a few moments.
Enraged Surge.trigger: You miss with an attack while raging
Enraged Surge.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to melee attack rolls and melee damage rolls until the end of your next turn.

Blood-Frenzy Strike.name: Blood-Frenzy Strike
Blood-Frenzy Strike.flavor: Your heavy blow draws blood and undermines the enemy’s resolve in the face of greater damage.
Blood-Frenzy Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
Blood-Frenzy Strike.thanebornTriumph: The vulnerability equals 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Fortune's Favor.name: Fortune's Favor
Fortune's Favor.flavor: You strike at an odd angle, gambling that your enemy will react by maneuvering into the force of your blow.
Fortune's Favor.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. You can reroll the attack. If the reroll hits, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage. If the reroll misses, the attack deals 1[W] less damage.

Iron Breaker's Shout.name: Iron Breaker's Shout
Iron Breaker's Shout.flavor: You deliver a telling blow, then issue a battle cry so ferocious that it causes your foes’ defenses to weaken.
Iron Breaker's Shout.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each enemy in the blast takes a penalty to all defenses equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.
Iron Breaker's Shout.thunderbornWrath: The penalty to all defenses equals 1 + your Constitution modifier.

Ancestral War Band Rage.name: Ancestral War Band Rage
Ancestral War Band Rage.flavor: You hew at your enemy, and the spirits of ancestral warriors rise up to aid you.
Ancestral War Band Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the ancestral war band. Until the rage ends, you gain combat advantage against any enemy when making primal melee attacks against it. In addition, whenever you roll a 1 on a damage die for a primal attack, the roll changes to the die’s maximum value.

Frost Hide Rage.name: Frost Hide Rage
Frost Hide Rage.flavor: Your weapon becomes icy as you strike. Afterward, the ice spreads over you, shielding you from harm.
Frost Hide Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Frost Hide Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the frost hide. Until the rage ends, you gain resistance to all damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Rage of the War Bringer.name: Rage of the War Bringer
Rage of the War Bringer.flavor: Your strike rings out, and your wrath boils over. You inspire your allies to strike true.
Rage of the War Bringer.effect: You enter the rage of the war bringer. Until the rage ends, any ally who has line of sight to you gains a bonus to melee damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

Scytheclaw Rage.name: Scytheclaw Rage
Scytheclaw Rage.flavor: You batter a foe to the ground, and you channel the spirit of the scytheclaw drake. Even as you swing your weapon, you kick and punch to keep your foes back.
Scytheclaw Rage.effect: You knock the target prone. You enter the rage of the scytheclaw drake. Until the rage ends, you can push an enemy adjacent to you 2 squares as a minor action once per round.

Battle Lust.name: Battle Lust
Battle Lust.flavor: Your bloodlust pulls you from the brink of death.
Battle Lust.trigger: You are dying at the start of your turn
Battle Lust.effect: You spend a healing surge, and you can stand up as a free action. Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and a +4 bonus to damage rolls.

Bounding Advance.name: Bounding Advance
Bounding Advance.effect: You shift 5 squares and can move through enemies’ spaces during the shift.

Rampant Malice.name: Rampant Malice
Rampant Malice.flavor: While your foe’s attention is drawn to your comrade, you maneuver for a telling blow.
Rampant Malice.effect: Until the end of your turn, you gain combat advantage against any enemy that is marked by an ally of yours.

Strength of Enduring Pain.name: Strength of Enduring Pain
Strength of Enduring Pain.flavor: The wound burns, but that pain merely adds to the devastation of your blows.
Strength of Enduring Pain.effect: Until the end of your turn, you gain a bonus to damage rolls equal to the ongoing damage (if you are taking multiple types of ongoing damage, the bonus equals the highest of them).

Blood-Spattered Frenzy.name: Blood-Spattered Frenzy
Blood-Spattered Frenzy.flavor: You whirl around, bathing your enemies in their own blood.
Blood-Spattered Frenzy.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Blood-Spattered Frenzy.whirlingSlayer: The attack can target Reflex instead of AC.

Frightening Strike.name: Frightening Strike
Frightening Strike.flavor: Your savage strike and maddened gaze wither the resolve of the enemies around you.
Frightening Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each enemy adjacent to you takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Frightening Strike.thanebornTriumph: The penalty to attack rolls equals 1 + your Charisma modifier.

Stone-Splitting Roar.name: Stone-Splitting Roar
Stone-Splitting Roar.flavor: Your strike draws on the strength of the earth and is followed by a thunderous battle cry that rattles your enemies.
Stone-Splitting Roar.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each enemy in the blast takes 2d6 thunder damage and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Stone-Splitting Roar.thunderbornWrath: Add your Constitution modifier to the thunder damage.

Primal War Band Rage.name: Primal War Band Rage
Primal War Band Rage.flavor: The spirits of an ancient war band spiral around you, distracting your foes.
Primal War Band Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the primal war band. Until the rage ends, each enemy within 5 squares of you grants combat advantage.

Blood Seeker's Pursuit.name: Blood Seeker's Pursuit
Blood Seeker's Pursuit.flavor: You are drawn to foes closer to death, and their wounds fortify you.
Blood Seeker's Pursuit.requirement: No enemies are adjacent to you.
Blood Seeker's Pursuit.effect: You shift your speed. You gain 1d8 + your Constitution modifier temporary hit points, plus 1d8 temporary hit points for each bloodied enemy adjacent to you at the end of the shift.

Brutal Payback.name: Brutal Payback
Brutal Payback.flavor: Absorbing a mighty blow, you turn your pain into power for a short time.
Brutal Payback.trigger: An enemy scores a critical hit against you
Brutal Payback.effect: You gain a +4 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Emboldening Courage.name: Emboldening Courage
Emboldening Courage.flavor: Your allies are heartened by your relentlessness and move to assist you.
Emboldening Courage.trigger: You hit or miss an enemy with a charge attack
Emboldening Courage.effect: As a free action, each target can shift 3 squares to a square closer to the enemy.

Unexpected Clarity.name: Unexpected Clarity
Unexpected Clarity.flavor: An astonishing strike opens up new opportunities for you.
Unexpected Clarity.trigger: You score a critical hit with a barbarian attack power and haven’t used Rampage during this round
Unexpected Clarity.effect: In place of making a melee basic attack as a result of Rampage, you can take an additional standard action on your next turn.

Leaves Before the Wind.name: Leaves Before the Wind
Leaves Before the Wind.flavor: The battle cry that follows your strike scatters your foes.
Leaves Before the Wind.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. You slide each enemy in the blast 3 squares.
Leaves Before the Wind.thunderbornWrath: The number of squares you slide each enemy equals 2 + your Constitution modifier.

Rage of the Unbridled Beast.name: Rage of the Unbridled Beast
Rage of the Unbridled Beast.flavor: Your strike savages your foe’s defenses and looses your inner beast, quickening your reflexes and causing pain to any foe that draws near.
Rage of the Unbridled Beast.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to AC equal to your Constitution modifier (save ends).
Rage of the Unbridled Beast.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a penalty to AC equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.
Rage of the Unbridled Beast.effect: You enter the rage of the unbridled beast. Until the rage ends, when any enemy enters a square adjacent to you, you can make a melee basic attack against that enemy as an opportunity action.

Crippling Assault.name: Crippling Assault
Crippling Assault.flavor: Your strike demoralizes your enemy, leaving it more vulnerable to ensuing blows.
Crippling Assault.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage until the start of your next turn.
Crippling Assault.thanebornTriumph: The vulnerability equals 3 + your Charisma modifier.
Crippling Assault.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Menacing Blow.name: Menacing Blow
Menacing Blow.flavor: Your ferocious swing chills your foe, leaving it ripe for further punishment.
Menacing Blow.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Terrifying Howl.name: Terrifying Howl
Terrifying Howl.flavor: You engage the enemy, and your thunderous battle cry crashes over your enemies, rattling them so much that they can’t move.
Terrifying Howl.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage. You then howl in a blast 3 that includes the target. Each enemy in the blast is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Terrifying Howl.thunderbornWrath: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a bonus to attack rolls against immobilized enemies equal to your Constitution modifier.

Ancient Forebears' Rage.name: Ancient Forebears' Rage
Ancient Forebears' Rage.flavor: You inflict a devastating blow, and the spirits of your forebears empower your other attacks.
