Ancient Forebears' Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the ancient forebears. Until the rage ends, whenever you roll 1 or 2 on a damage die for a primal attack, the roll changes to the die’s maximum value.

Rage of Retribution.name: Rage of Retribution
Rage of Retribution.flavor: Waves of force issue from your blow, injuring surrounding enemies.Your rage erupts, immediately punishing enemies that wound you.
Rage of Retribution.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each enemy, other than the target, within 5 squares of you takes 2[W] force damage.
Rage of Retribution.effect: You enter the rage of retribution. Until the rage ends, whenever a single attack deals 20 damage or more to you, you can deal 10 damage to each enemy within 5 squares of you as a free action.

Rage of the Thundering Rhino.name: Rage of the Thundering Rhino
Rage of the Thundering Rhino.flavor: You channel your attack to awaken the rage of the thundering rhino. When you hit a foe, you send it flying.
Rage of the Thundering Rhino.effect: You enter the rage of the thundering rhino. Until the rage ends, whenever you hit an enemy with a basic attack, that attack deals 1[W] extra thunder damage, and you push that enemy 1 square.
Rage of the Thundering Rhino.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier. The target and each creature adjacent to it are then knocked prone.
Rage of the Thundering Rhino.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Always Falling Rage.name: Always Falling Rage
Always Falling Rage.flavor: The fury of the waterfall and the relentless push of the waters propels you past any defenses.
Always Falling Rage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength damage, and you knock the target prone.
Always Falling Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the Always Falling spirit. Until the rage ends, when one of your allies hits an enemy adjacent to you, you can shift 2 squares as an immediate reaction.

Bloodseeker's Rage.name: Bloodseeker's Rage
Bloodseeker's Rage.flavor: As you strike, flashes of spectral teeth and blood-red hide reveal the bloodseeker drake predator spirit that inspires your rage.
Bloodseeker's Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the bloodseeker. Until the rage ends, you can make an opportunity attack against any bloodied enemy adjacent to you that shifts.

Skull-Taker's Rage.name: Skull-Taker's Rage
Skull-Taker's Rage.flavor: The ancient berserker spirit that drives this rage doesn’t care that its presence tears you apart, vein by vein. It wants the skulls of your enemies, no matter how they’ ve tried to wedge themselves into their cowards’ armor.
Skull-Taker's Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the skull-taker. Until the rage ends, you take 3 damage at the start of each of your turns. This damage cannot be resisted or negated. Until the rage ends, you also have a +1 bonus to your attack rolls.

Ambusher's Rage.name: Ambusher's Rage
Ambusher's Rage.flavor: Blood calls. The ambush drake’s throaty roar erupts from your throat as you fling yourself around your wounded enemy in a dizzying set-up for the death blow.
Ambusher's Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the ambusher. Until the rage ends, you can shift 2 squares as a minor action as long as you end the shift adjacent to a bloodied enemy.

Carver's Raging Glory.name: Carver's Raging Glory
Carver's Raging Glory.flavor: Your axe rises in time with the ocean’s pounding waves. Your axe falls with power borrowed from each crashing death.
Carver's Raging Glory.effect: You enter the rage of Carver’s glory. Until the rage ends, whenever you reduce any enemy to 0 hit points, your next attack deals 5 extra damage.

Stoneroot Rage.name: Stoneroot Rage
Stoneroot Rage.flavor: The power wells up from deep within the unassailable earth.
Stoneroot Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and target is slowed (save ends).
Stoneroot Rage.effect: You enter the rage of Stoneroot. Until the rage ends, you gain resist 5 to all damage.

Whisper's Blades Rage.name: Whisper's Blades Rage
Whisper's Blades Rage.flavor: A shifting aura of moons and stars outlines your form. As blood drips from your blade and from the enemy who never saw your cut coming, you can hear the wicked laughter of the trickster spirit.
Whisper's Blades Rage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and deal the same amount of damage to a different enemy within 5 squares.
Whisper's Blades Rage.effect: You enter the rage of Whisper’s blades. Until the rage ends, once per round when you hit with a melee attack on your turn, you can choose to reduce the damage of that attack by 10 and deal 10 damage to another creature within 5 squares of you.

Fortune's Ravagers Rage.name: Fortune's Ravagers Rage
Fortune's Ravagers Rage.flavor: Sometimes good luck leads directly to bad, and when your foe is lucky enough to make an extraordinarily effective attack, you’re right there to slam that luck back down its throat.
Fortune's Ravagers Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the fortune’s ravager. Until the rage ends, you can repeat the rage’s attack as an immediate interrupt that targets any enemy adjacent to you that rolls a critical hit with an attack.

Earthquake Dragon's Rage.name: Earthquake Dragon's Rage
Earthquake Dragon's Rage.flavor: The ground shakes, and the air splits. You can barely hear the voices of your friends asking you to call on a different primal spirit to drive your rage.
Earthquake Dragon's Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the earthquake dragon. Until the end of your next turn or until the rage ends (whichever is longer), whenever an enemy hits you, you deal thunder damage equal to your Strength modifier to each creature within 5 squares of you.

Savage Reach.name: Savage Reach
Savage Reach.flavor: Your great strength and the reach of your weapon allow you to smash enemies aside with each blow.
Savage Reach.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon.
Savage Reach.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square. If you are raging, you can slide the target 2 squares.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Room for Carnage.name: Room for Carnage
Room for Carnage.flavor: You drive your foes backward with the haft of your weapon, giving you enough room to deliver a mighty blow.
Room for Carnage.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon.
Room for Carnage.effect: You push each enemy adjacent to you 1 square.

Longstrike Charge.name: Longstrike Charge
Longstrike Charge.flavor: You surge toward your target, your momentum and the length of your weapon adding devastating speed and power to your attack.
Longstrike Charge.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon.
Longstrike Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack. When you do so, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to the number of squares you moved during the charge.

Longstrike Slayer Rage.name: Longstrike Slayer Rage
Longstrike Slayer Rage.flavor: Your weapon smashes into your targets like a steel hurricane as your fury enhances its leverage and power with each strike.
Longstrike Slayer Rage.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon.
Longstrike Slayer Rage.target: Each enemy you can see and is not adjacent to you in the burst
Longstrike Slayer Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the longstrike slayer. Until the rage ends, you gain a power bonus equal to your Constitution modifier to melee and close weapon damage rolls against targets that are 2 or more squares away from you.

Devastating Leverage.name: Devastating Leverage
Devastating Leverage.flavor: You swing your weapon in a wide arc, using the terrible power generated by its length to smash your enemy to the ground.
Devastating Leverage.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon.
Devastating Leverage.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square and knock the target prone.

Shattering Reach.name: Shattering Reach
Shattering Reach.flavor: The long haft of your weapon allows you to strike with enough force to shatter armor and shields like brittle glass.
Shattering Reach.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon.
Shattering Reach.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to AC equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Slashing Tornado Rage.name: Slashing Tornado Rage
Slashing Tornado Rage.flavor: The howling winds of the tornado enhance your whirling strike. As the fury of the tornado fills you, your fury reaches out to strike at any who oppose you.
Slashing Tornado Rage.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon.
Slashing Tornado Rage.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Slashing Tornado Rage.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Slashing Tornado Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the slashing tornado. Until the rage ends, at the start of each of your turns, deal damage equal to your Constitution modifier to each enemy within 2 squares of you.

Rampant Reach.name: Rampant Reach
Rampant Reach.flavor: No one can escape the reach of your rage.
Rampant Reach.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon.
Rampant Reach.trigger: You score a critical hit with a barbarian attack power
Rampant Reach.effect: You have threatening reach with the weapon used in the triggering attack until the end of your next turn. You also gain a bonus to damage rolls with opportunity attacks equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Mammoth Leverage.name: Mammoth Leverage
Mammoth Leverage.flavor: Focusing all of your strength and the terrible power generated by your weapon into one monumental blow, you smash your enemy clear across the battlefield.
Mammoth Leverage.requirement: You must be using a two-handed reach weapon.
Mammoth Leverage.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares and knock it prone.

Rending Strike.name: Rending Strike
Rending Strike.flavor: You tear your weapon through the enemy, leaving it vulnerable to an ally’s attack.
Rending Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the next time the target takes damage before the start of your next turn, it takes 1d6 extra damage and you slide it 1 square.
Rending Strike.thanebornTriumph: You can slide the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier instead of 1.

Bloodthirsty Resurgence.name: Bloodthirsty Resurgence
Bloodthirsty Resurgence.flavor: When you call upon your hidden reserves, you evoke the same new will in your allies.
Bloodthirsty Resurgence.target: Each ally in the burst that can see you
Bloodthirsty Resurgence.effect: The target gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

Roaring Challenge.name: Roaring Challenge
Roaring Challenge.flavor: Upon striking your foe, you let loose a challenging roar, daring your foes to face you.
Roaring Challenge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you make a close blast 3 secondary attack.
Roaring Challenge.secondaryOnHit: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Wheat to the Scythe.name: Wheat to the Scythe
Wheat to the Scythe.flavor: The enemies fall before your weapon’s wide arc, like wheat to the scythe.
Wheat to the Scythe.target: Each enemy in the burst that you can see
Wheat to the Scythe.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, the target falls prone, and you regain 1 hit point.
Wheat to the Scythe.thanebornTriumph: You can push the target 1 square.

Ruinous Strike.name: Ruinous Strike
Ruinous Strike.flavor: The enemy recoils from your strike, shrinking away from you in terror to its own detriment.
Ruinous Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, you can slide the target 1 square, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to the next attack that hits it before the start of your next turn.
Ruinous Strike.thanebornTriumph: You can slide the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier instead of 1.

Kill Them All.name: Kill Them All
Kill Them All.flavor: You wrench your weapon from the corpse and call out to your comrades to end this fight.
Kill Them All.thanebornTriumph: The burst is equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.
Kill Them All.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points
Kill Them All.target: Each ally in the burst that can hear you
Kill Them All.effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and deals 1d6 extra damage on melee and ranged attacks until the end of your next turn.

Bloody Roar.name: Bloody Roar
Bloody Roar.flavor: Your savage strike compels you to loose a terrifying scream at your enemies.
Bloody Roar.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you make a close blast 3 secondary attack.
Bloody Roar.secondaryOnHit: You push the target 3 squares, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Throw Back the Horde.name: Throw Back the Horde
Throw Back the Horde.flavor: The enemies gather around you, but you throw them back with a roar and a wide sweep of your weapon.
Throw Back the Horde.target: Each enemy in the burst that you can see
Throw Back the Horde.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, you push the target 3 squares and knock it prone, and you regain 2 hit points.
Throw Back the Horde.thanebornTriumph: You push the target a number of squares equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier instead of 3 squares.

Nowhere to Run.name: Nowhere to Run
Nowhere to Run.flavor: Your strike causes the enemy to panic, but no matter where it turns, your allies are there to confound its escape.
Nowhere to Run.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square. Whenever the target is damaged by an attack before the start of your next turn, the target takes 1d6 extra damage and you slide the target 1 square.

Earth Grasp Rage.name: Earth Grasp Rage
Earth Grasp Rage.flavor: Your rage reaches out to Stone Brother, and arms of molten stone form to grab your foe.
Earth Grasp Rage.onHit: 1[W] damage + Strength modifier. The target takes ongoing 5 fire damage and is immobilized (save ends both).
Earth Grasp Rage.onMiss: Half damage, and the target falls prone.
Earth Grasp Rage.effect: You enter the rage of earth’s grasp. Until the rage ends, your attacks against immobilized, restrained, or prone targets deal 5 extra fire damage.

Aggressive Lunge.name: Aggressive Lunge
Aggressive Lunge.flavor: You lunge forward at your enemy, hoping to send it reeling.
Aggressive Lunge.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. You then shift 1 square into the space the target just left.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Aggressive Lunge.berserkerFury:
This attack gains the primal keyword and deals 1d6 extra damage.
Level 11: 2d6 damage.
Level 21: 3d6 damage.

Jarring Smash.name: Jarring Smash
Jarring Smash.flavor: You slam your weapon into your enemy, causing it to reel at the force of your blow.
Jarring Smash.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Jarring Smash.berserkerFury:
This attack gains the primal keyword and deals 1d8 extra damage.
Level 11: 2d8 damage.
Level 21: 3d8 damage.

Run Down.name: Run Down
Run Down.flavor: You smash your enemy in a vulnerable place, slowing it and keeping it from escaping you.
Run Down.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Run Down.berserkerFury:
This attack gains the primal keyword and deals 1d8 extra damage.
Level 11: 2d8 damage.
Level 21: 3d8 damage.

Stalk and Strike.name: Stalk and Strike
Stalk and Strike.flavor: You creep toward your enemy, low and lurking, and then strike with surprising speed.
Stalk and Strike.effect: You shift up to 2 squares before the attack.
Stalk and Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Stalk and Strike.berserkerFury:
This attack gains the primal keyword and deals 1d8 extra damage.
Level 11: 2d8 damage.
Level 21: 3d8 damage.

Batter Down.name: Batter Down
Batter Down.flavor: You hammer your enemy, knocking it to the ground before you.
Batter Down.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Savage Cut.name: Savage Cut
Savage Cut.flavor: You drive your weapon into your enemy in the way that the jaws of a wolf seek its prey’s throat, and you rend it savagely.

Life-Ending Strike.name: Life-Ending Strike
Life-Ending Strike.flavor: You lash out at your enemy with a mighty strike that presages the end of its life.
Life-Ending Strike.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Sweeping Cut.name: Sweeping Cut
Sweeping Cut.flavor: You sweep your weapon in a wide arc, driving your foes to the ground where they will be at your mercy.
Sweeping Cut.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Sweeping Cut.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Ignore Pain.name: Ignore Pain
Ignore Pain.flavor: When your enemies hurt you, the strength of your rage allows you to shove the pain aside for a time.
Ignore Pain.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering damage.

Nomad's Rush.name: Nomad's Rush
Nomad's Rush.flavor: Your training allows you to spot rough terrain with ease—and dash over it without a second thought.
Nomad's Rush.effect: You move up to your speed + 4. During this move, you ignore difficult terrain.

Implacable Advance.name: Implacable Advance
Implacable Advance.flavor: You advance on your enemy and strike, continuing to close with your foe even if it tries to flee.
Implacable Advance.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. In addition, the first time the target moves before the end of your next turn, you can shift up to your speed to a square adjacent to the target as a free action after its movement.

Thundering Smash.name: Thundering Smash
Thundering Smash.flavor: You attack your enemy with such crashing force that the foes around it feel the effect of the blow.
Thundering Smash.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 thunder damage.

Dangerous Presence.name: Dangerous Presence
Dangerous Presence.flavor: You strike quickly and decisively, showing your deadly skill to your enemies and causing them to cower in fear.
Dangerous Presence.effect: Until the end of the encounter, enemies grant combat advantage while subject to your defender aura.

Feral Rampage.name: Feral Rampage
Feral Rampage.flavor: The passion of the predator flows through you, allowing you to move between your enemies and cut both of them down like stalks of wheat.
Feral Rampage.effect: You can shift up to your speed after the first attack.

Cull Weakness.name: Cull Weakness
Cull Weakness.flavor: Only the strong survive, and you let your enemies know that you are a survivor as you strike down the weakest among them with ease. The others quail before you as their wounds mount.
Cull Weakness.effect: You assume the cull weakness stance. Until the stance ends, bloodied enemies grant combat advantage to you, and you gain a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against them.

Wilderness Step.name: Wilderness Step
Wilderness Step.flavor: Your skill in traversing the wilderness allows you to bypass hindering effects that would delay others.
Wilderness Step.trigger: You start your turn subject to an immobilized, restrained, or slowed condition that a save can end.
Wilderness Step.effect: You make a saving throw with a +2 power bonus against one triggering condition.

Deny Escape.name: Deny Escape
Deny Escape.flavor: In your bloodlust, letting an enemy go isn’t an option. You attack with great force, preventing your foe from escaping your fury.
Deny Escape.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Shattering Strike.name: Shattering Strike
Shattering Strike.flavor: The primal force flowing from your body enables your attack to strike true even against ethereal targets.
Shattering Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier force damage. This damage ignores the insubstantial quality.

Eye of the Maelstrom.name: Eye of the Maelstrom
Eye of the Maelstrom.flavor: You attack your foes with incredible speed and strength, becoming a vortex of whirling strikes that seek out any foe that unwisely ignores you.
Eye of the Maelstrom.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your defender aura expands to an aura 2, and you can shift 1 square as a free action before making a melee basic attack granted by your vengeful guardian power.

Wrath of the Storm.name: Wrath of the Storm
Wrath of the Storm.flavor: Your rage is like that of the howling storm. When you attack, you violently sweep aside the foe that dared to stand in your way.
Wrath of the Storm.effect: You push the target up to 4 squares and knock it prone.

Circle of Battle.name: Circle of Battle
Circle of Battle.flavor: You command your allies to clear out a space, allowing you to draw an enemy’s focus to yourself.
Circle of Battle.target: One enemy subject to your defender aura
Circle of Battle.effect: As a free action, each of your allies adjacent to the target can shift up to 2 squares to a square that is not adjacent to the target. Additionally, until the start of your next turn, when you hit the target with an opportunity attack or a vengeful guardian attack, you immobilize it until the end of its next turn.

Surge of Fury.name: Surge of Fury
Surge of Fury.flavor: You release a howl that blocks out the whispers of your enemies and fills you with a fury that gives you a clarity of purpose.
Surge of Fury.trigger: You start your turn subject to a dazing or dominating effect.
Surge of Fury.effect: You end the triggering effect. Until the end of your next turn you are immune to effects that daze or dominate you.

Drive to the Ground.name: Drive to the Ground
Drive to the Ground.flavor: You drive your weapon into your foe with such ferocity that it staggers away and crashes to the ground.
Drive to the Ground.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target up to 2 squares and knock it prone.

Blood for Strength.name: Blood for Strength
Blood for Strength.flavor: You deliver a brutal wound to your enemy, offering the result of your bloodlust to the spirits that fuel your rage.

Bloodletting Assault.name: Bloodletting Assault
Bloodletting Assault.flavor: You sprint over the intervening ground, then drive your weapon into your enemy with an unnatural strength that cannot be denied.
Bloodletting Assault.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Slash at the Knees.name: Slash at the Knees
Slash at the Knees.flavor: Even though surrounded by foes, you become a whirlwind of death, hurting and incapacitating every one of them.
Slash at the Knees.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Slash at the Knees.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Distracting Advance.name: Distracting Advance
Distracting Advance.flavor: You bolt into the fray, bellowing a battle cry that distracts your foe long enough for your comrades to move away.
Distracting Advance.effect: You shift up to half your speed. If you end this shift adjacent to an enemy, each of your allies adjacent to that enemy can shift up to 3 squares as a free action to a square that is not adjacent to that enemy.

Path of the Predator.name: Path of the Predator
Path of the Predator.flavor: You lunge forward with such quickness and grace that you pounce on your foe before it sees you coming.
Path of the Predator.effect: You shift up to twice your speed. During this shift, you can make Athletics checks to climb, jump, and swim. If you end this shift adjacent to an enemy, that enemy grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Forceful Spirits.name: Forceful Spirits
Forceful Spirits.flavor: Your attack is driven by the power of the spirits, sending foes near your enemy reeling.
Forceful Spirits.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. In addition, each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 force damage and is pushed up to 2 squares from the target.

Unavoidable Stalker.name: Unavoidable Stalker
Unavoidable Stalker.flavor: You strike your target and then continue to track it, remaining in step with it no matter where it goes.
Unavoidable Stalker.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. In addition, at the end of the target’s next turn, if it is not adjacent to you, you can shift up to your speed + 2 to a square adjacent to the target as a free action.

Terrifying Presence.name: Terrifying Presence
Terrifying Presence.flavor: You land a mighty blow and face your enemies, terrifying them with the visage of your battle lust.
Terrifying Presence.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until your defender aura ends, enemies in your defender aura grant combat advantage and cannot make opportunity attacks.

Torrent of Destruction.name: Torrent of Destruction
Torrent of Destruction.flavor: The spirits spur you into action, giving you the speed and fury to sweep across the battlefield like a windstorm.
Torrent of Destruction.effect: You shift up to your speed. During the shift, you can make the following attack once against each creature to which you move adjacent.

Limitless Advance.name: Limitless Advance
Limitless Advance.flavor: No enemy is beyond your reach, and you let no obstacle stop you from reaching a foe.
Limitless Advance.effect: You move up to your speed. During this movement, you can jump horizontally a number of squares up to your speed without needing to make an Athletics check, and you can climb and swim at full speed rather than half speed. Your total distance moved cannot exceed your speed. Additionally, any falling damage you take is reduced by 20 until the end of the turn.
Limitless Advance.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Driving Smash.name: Driving Smash
Driving Smash.flavor: As your weapon strikes home, you shatter your enemy’s defenses in addition to dealing it a vicious blow.
Driving Smash.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. This attack ignores the insubstantial quality and the target’s resistances.

Wracking Wound.name: Wracking Wound
Wracking Wound.flavor: You slash at your foe, dealing it a wound that causes great pain when your enemy moves.
Wracking Wound.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier for each square of voluntary movement it undertakes.

Unmatched Precision.name: Unmatched Precision
Unmatched Precision.flavor: You strike down your foe with such focus and poise that it seems as though your attacks cannot miss.
Unmatched Precision.berserkerFury: This attack gains the primal keyword and deals 2[W] extra damage.
Unmatched Precision.effect: Until the end of the encounter, while you have no unused encounter attack powers, whenever you make an attack roll for a melee basic attack or a barbarian at-will attack power, you can roll twice and use either result.

Forceful Evisceration.name: Forceful Evisceration
Forceful Evisceration.flavor: You channel the primal power around you into your weapon and strike. The attack not only causes immense damage, it leaves your enemy devoid of its natural protection for a time.
Forceful Evisceration.onHit: 4[W] + 3d8 + Strength modifier force damage, and the target loses all resistances until the end of your next turn.

Keep It Down.name: Keep It Down
Keep It Down.flavor: You put your enemy down on the ground—and keep it there.
Keep It Down.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. Until the end of your next turn, the target provokes opportunity attacks whenever it stands up.

Deadly Sweep.name: Deadly Sweep
Deadly Sweep.flavor: You execute a series of strikes so blindingly fast that your enemies fall before you or are driven back.
Deadly Sweep.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Deadly Sweep.berserkerFury: This attack gains the primal keyword and deals 2[W] extra damage.
Deadly Sweep.effect: You can choose to either push the target up to 2 squares or knock it prone.

Vengeful Guardian.name: Vengeful Guardian
Vengeful Guardian.flavor: Your nearby enemies learn the hard way that it is unwise to ignore you.
Vengeful Guardian.trigger: An enemy subject to your defender aura either shifts or makes an attack that targets an ally of yours, without targeting you or an ally who has an active defender aura.
Vengeful Guardian.effect:
You make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy and deal 1d8 extra damage to it.
Level 11: 2d8 extra damage.
Level 21: 3d8 extra damage. On a miss, the attack deals half damage to the triggering enemy.

Crushing Charge.name: Crushing Charge
Crushing Charge.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Crushing Charge.flavor: The impact of your charge smashes your foe back to crush it against solid terrain.
Crushing Charge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares. If the target ends this push adjacent to blocking terrain, the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Crushing Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
